segments.text: when are you going to give me those brochures ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What ’ s the rush ? You ’ re not leaving for another week .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know , but I want to make reservations this week .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay . I ’ ll bring them in tomorrow for sure .
